name: Space Bail
description:
Space Bail is a game that was created for the GMTK 2020 Jam.

All code and art was created during the 48 hour jam session.

-- Instructions --

Use your bucket (space bar) to scoop up the space that's leaking into your ship and eject it back into ...space. Your bucket is also used to attack enemies and steer your ship; just like real life!

Use the arrow keys to move.
